description: This file defines the Vehicle class and the VehicleStatus enum, which model vehicle entities including their attributes, state, and serialization methods within a fleet management system.

classes.name: Vehicle
classes.description: Represents a vehicle with attributes such as id, name, license plate, type, status, mileage, and group affiliation. Includes methods for serialization and cloning.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts a Vehicle instance into a Map suitable for persistence or transmission.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Vehicle instance from a Map, facilitating deserialization.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Vehicle with optional modifications for any attribute.
